abstract: Retired New York City detective Louis Scarcella declines in Brooklyn hearing to give explanation for why John D Bunn was arrested in 1991 on suspicion of killing Police Officers Robert E Crosson and Rolando Neischer; Scarcella has been scrutinized for false convictions during his time on force; Bunn was 14 at time of conviction and has since served 16 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: The controversial retired police detective testified on Friday at a court hearing on whether John D. Bunn was wrongfully charged in the shooting of two off-duty correction officers.

headline.main: Louis Scarcella Defends His Work at Hearing on Conviction in ’91 Murder
headline.print_headline: Ex-Detective Defends His Work at Hearing on Conviction in ’91 Murder
